markdown:
The brutish and gluttonous augnagar live to feast—preferably on rotten flesh and, when possible, demon flesh. But to them, the greatest delicacy is the flesh of other augnagars. Augnagars have swollen, spiderlike legs with leathery membranes like a bat's wings, and three tails ending in hooked stings perfect for slicing flesh. An augnagar that gorges sufficiently, especially on other augnagars, can grow so massive it can't even move, thrashing and festering where it lies. It eventually flies into a frenzy of self-cannibalism as it rips apart its own flesh to feast on. From the ruinous remains emerges a [thulgant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=777)—a smaller but more powerful qlippoth. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Augnagar](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3156) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 281 1.1 **Perception** +27; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=371)) 30 feet, [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +26 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +8 **Int** -2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +23 **Will** +25 **HP** 225 **Immunities** [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=64), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598) **Resistances** [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647) 15, physical 15 (except [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375)) --- **Speed** 40 feet, climb 40 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** jaws +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 3d12+14 piercing plus 3d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and rotting curse **Melee** sting +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus 3d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 31 - **5th** [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (×3) - **Constant (7th)** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Confusing Display** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The augnagar's writhing limbs and flesh seethe and squirm in a disorienting and unsettling manner. Creatures in a 30-foot emanation must attempt a DC 34 Will save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Confusing Displays for 1 minute.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94) for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature is stupefied 1 and [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63) for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the creature can't attempt a flat check to recover from confusion whenever it takes damage from an attack or spell. **Inhale Vitality** ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The augnagar inhales sharply, drawing life force out of creatures in a 50-foot cone. Creatures in the area take 14d6 void damage with a DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. A creature that fails its save is also [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73). If any creatures take damage from this activity, the augnagar becomes [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=89) for 1 round, and it can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. **Rotting Curse** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Stage 1** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) (1 day); **Stage 2** drained 2 and the creature displays hideous, festering wounds exuding a horrific stench. When the victim takes piercing or slashing damage, creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91). The victim automatically fails this save (1 day).
name: Augnagar

text: Augnagar (Hunger Qlippoth) The brutish and gluttonous augnagar live to feast—preferably on rotten flesh and, when possible, demon flesh. But to them, the greatest delicacy is the flesh of other augnagars. Augnagars have swollen, spiderlike legs with leathery membranes like a bat's wings, and three tails ending in hooked stings perfect for slicing flesh. An augnagar that gorges sufficiently, especially on other augnagars, can grow so massive it can't even move, thrashing and festering where it lies. It eventually flies into a frenzy of self-cannibalism as it rips apart its own flesh to feast on. From the ruinous remains emerges a thulgant—a smaller but more powerful qlippoth. Recall Knowledge - Fiend (Religion): DC 34 Unspecific Lore : DC 32 Specific Lore : DC 29 Augnagar Source Monster Core pg. 281 1.1 Perception +27; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet, truesight Languages Chthonian; telepathy 100 feet Skills Acrobatics +27, Athletics +28, Intimidation +26 Str +8 Dex +5 Con +8 Int -2 Wis +5 Cha +4 --- AC 36 Fort +28 Ref +23 Will +25 HP 225 Immunities controlled, fear Resistances mental 15, physical 15 (except cold iron) --- Speed 40 feet, climb 40 feet, fly 40 feet Melee Single Action jaws +28 (Magical, reach 10 feet, Unholy), Damage 3d12+14 piercing plus 3d6 persistent bleed and rotting curse Melee Single Action sting +28 (Agile, Magical, Finesse, reach 15 feet, Unholy), Damage 3d8+14 slashing plus 3d6 persistent bleed Occult Innate Spells DC 31 - 5th Translocate (×3) - Constant (7th) Truesight Confusing Display Two Actions (Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Incapacitation, Mental, Occult, Visual) The augnagar's writhing limbs and flesh seethe and squirm in a disorienting and unsettling manner. Creatures in a 30-foot emanation must attempt a DC 34 Will save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Confusing Displays for 1 minute. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature is stupefied 1 for 1 round. Failure The creature is stupefied 1 and confused for 1 minute. Critical Failure As failure, but the creature can't attempt a flat check to recover from confusion whenever it takes damage from an attack or spell. Inhale Vitality Two Actions (Occult, Void) Frequency once per day; Effect The augnagar inhales sharply, drawing life force out of creatures in a 50-foot cone. Creatures in the area take 14d6 void damage with a DC 34 basic Fortitude save. A creature that fails its save is also fatigued. If any creatures take damage from this activity, the augnagar becomes quickened for 1 round, and it can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. Rotting Curse (Curse, Disease, Occult) Saving Throw DC 32 Fortitude; Stage 1 drained 1 (1 day); Stage 2 drained 2 and the creature displays hideous, festering wounds exuding a horrific stench. When the victim takes piercing or slashing damage, creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or become sickened 1. The victim automatically fails this save (1 day).
